docblock.description: Wrapper for shared memory and locking functionality across different extensions.
docblock.long-description:
Allows you to share data across requests as long as the PHP process is running. One of APC or WinCache is required to accomplish this, with other extensions being potentially pluggable as adapters.

PHP version 5

tag.name: author
tag.description: Vasil Rangelov <boen.robot@gmail.com>

tag.name: copyright
tag.description: 2011 Vasil Rangelov

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html LGPL License 2.1

docblock.description: Main class for this package.
docblock.long-description: Automatically chooses an adapter based on the available extensions.

tag.name: author
tag.description: Vasil Rangelov <boen.robot@gmail.com>

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html LGPL License 2.1

tag.name: var
tag.description: An array of adapter names that meet their requirements.

docblock.description: Creates a new shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Estabilishes a separate persistent storage. Adapter is automatically chosen based on the available extensions.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID for the storage.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A new instance of an SHM adapter (child of this class).

docblock.description: Checks if the adapter meets its requirements.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Registers an adapter.
docblock.long-description: Registers an SHM adapter, allowing you to call it with {@link factory()}.

tag.name: param
tag.description: FQCN of adapter. A valid adapter is one that extends this class.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether to prepend this adapter into the list of possible adapters, instead of appending to it.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Adds a value to the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Adds a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, or fails if it does.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Seconds to store the value. If set to 0 indicates no time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Gets a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: This is a magic method, thanks to which any property you attempt to get the value of will be fetched from the adapter, treating the property name as the key of the value to get.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to get.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The current value of the specified key.

docblock.description: Sets a value in the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: This is a magic method, thanks to which any property you attempt to set the value of will be set by the adapter, treating the property name as the key of the value to set. The value is set without a TTL.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Checks if a specified key is in the storage.
docblock.long-description: This is a magic method, thanks to which any property you call isset() on will be checked by the adapter, treating the property name as the key of the value to check.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to check.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if the key is in the storage, FALSE otherwise.

docblock.description: Deletes a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: This is a magic method, thanks to which any property you attempt to unset the value of will be unset by the adapter, treating the property name as the key of the value to delete.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to delete.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Creates a new shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Estabilishes a separate persistent storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID for the storage. The storage will be reused if it exists, or created if it doesn't exist. Data and locks are namespaced by this ID.

docblock.description: Obtains a named lock.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of the key to obtain. Note that $key may repeat for each distinct $persistentId.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If the lock can't be immediatly obtained, the script will block for at most the specified amount of seconds. Setting this to 0 makes lock obtaining non blocking, and setting it to NULL makes it block without a time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Releases a named lock.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of the key to release. Note that $key may repeat for each distinct $persistentId.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Checks if a specified key is in the storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to check.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if the key is in the storage, FALSE otherwise.

docblock.description: Adds a value to the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Adds a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, or fails if it does.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Seconds to store the value. If set to 0 indicates no time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Sets a value in the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Adds a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, overwrites it otherwise.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Seconds to store the value. If set to 0 indicates no time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Gets a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Gets the current value, or throws an exception if it's not stored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to get the value of.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The current value of the specified key.

docblock.description: Deletes a value from the shared memory storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to delete.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Increases a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Increases a value from the shared memory storage. Unlike a plain set($key, get($key)+$step) combination, this function also implicitly performs locking.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to increase.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value to increase the key by.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The new value.

docblock.description: Decreases a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Decreases a value from the shared memory storage. Unlike a plain set($key, get($key)-$step) combination, this function also implicitly performs locking.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to decrease.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value to decrease the key by.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The new value.

docblock.description: Sets a new value if a key has a certain value.
docblock.long-description: Sets a new value if a key has a certain value. This function only works when $old and $new are longs.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Key of the value to compare and set.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value to compare the key against.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value to set the key to.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Clears the persistent storage.
docblock.long-description: Clears the persistent storage, i.e. removes all keys. Locks are left intact.

docblock.description: Wrapper for shared memory and locking functionality across different extensions.
docblock.long-description:
Allows you to share data across requests as long as the PHP process is running. One of APC or WinCache is required to accomplish this, with other extensions being potentially pluggable as adapters.

PHP version 5

tag.name: author
tag.description: Vasil Rangelov <boen.robot@gmail.com>

tag.name: copyright
tag.description: 2011 Vasil Rangelov

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html LGPL License 2.1

docblock.description: Shared memory adapter for the APC extension.

tag.name: author
tag.description: Vasil Rangelov <boen.robot@gmail.com>

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html LGPL License 2.1

tag.name: var
tag.description: ID of the current storage.

docblock.description: List of persistent IDs.
docblock.long-description: A list of persistent IDs within the current request (as keys) with an int (as a value) specifying the number of instances in the current request. Used as an attempt to ensure implicit lock releases even on errors in the critical sections, since APC doesn't have an actual locking function.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Array of lock names (as values) for each persistent ID (as key) obtained during the current request.

docblock.description: Creates a new shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Estabilishes a separate persistent storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID for the storage. The storage will be reused if it exists, or created if it doesn't exist. Data and locks are namespaced by this ID.

docblock.description: Checks if the adapter meets its requirements.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Releases all locks in a storage.
docblock.long-description: This function is not meant to be used directly. It is implicitly called by the the destructor and as a shutdown function when the request ends. One of these calls ends up releasing any unreleased locks obtained during the request. A lock is also implicitly released as soon as there are no objects left in the current request using the same persistent ID.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The internal persistent ID, the locks of which are being released.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether the function was executed at shutdown.

docblock.description: Releases any locks obtained by this instance as soon as there are no more references to the object's persistent ID.
Obtains a named lock.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of the key to obtain. Note that $key may repeat for each distinct $persistentId.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If the lock can't be immediatly obtained, the script will block for at most the specified amount of seconds. Setting this to 0 makes lock obtaining non blocking, and setting it to NULL makes it block without a time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Releases a named lock.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of the key to release. Note that $key may repeat for each distinct $persistentId.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Checks if a specified key is in the storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to check.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if the key is in the storage, FALSE otherwise.

docblock.description: Adds a value to the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Adds a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, or fails if it does.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Seconds to store the value. If set to 0 indicates no time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Sets a value in the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Adds a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, overwrites it otherwise.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Seconds to store the value. If set to 0 indicates no time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Gets a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Gets the current value, or throws an exception if it's not stored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to get the value of.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The current value of the specified key.

docblock.description: Deletes a value from the shared memory storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to delete.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Increases a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Increases a value from the shared memory storage. Unlike a plain set($key, get($key)+$step) combination, this function also implicitly performs locking.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to increase.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value to increase the key by.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The new value.

docblock.description: Decreases a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Decreases a value from the shared memory storage. Unlike a plain set($key, get($key)-$step) combination, this function also implicitly performs locking.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to decrease.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value to decrease the key by.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The new value.

docblock.description: Sets a new value if a key has a certain value.
docblock.long-description: Sets a new value if a key has a certain value. This function only works when $old and $new are longs.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Key of the value to compare and set.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value to compare the key against.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value to set the key to.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Clears the persistent storage.
docblock.long-description: Clears the persistent storage, i.e. removes all keys. Locks are left intact.

docblock.description: Retrieve an external iterator
docblock.long-description: Returns an external iterator.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A PCRE regular expression. Only matching keys will be iterated over. Setting this to NULL matches all keys of this instance.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether to return only the keys, or return both the keys and values.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array with all matching keys as array keys, and values as array values. If $keysOnly is TRUE, the array keys are numeric, and the array values are key names.

docblock.description: Wrapper for shared memory and locking functionality across different extensions.
docblock.long-description:
Allows you to share data across requests as long as the PHP process is running. One of APC or WinCache is required to accomplish this, with other extensions being potentially pluggable as adapters.

PHP version 5

tag.name: author
tag.description: Vasil Rangelov <boen.robot@gmail.com>

tag.name: copyright
tag.description: 2011 Vasil Rangelov

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html LGPL License 2.1

docblock.description: This adapter is not truly persistent.
docblock.long-description: It is intended to emulate persistency in non persistent environments, so that upper level applications can use a single code path for persistent and non persistent code.

tag.name: author
tag.description: Vasil Rangelov <boen.robot@gmail.com>

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html LGPL License 2.1

tag.name: var
tag.description: ID of the current storage.

docblock.description: List of persistent IDs.
docblock.long-description: A list of persistent IDs within the current request (as keys) with an int (as a value) specifying the number of instances in the current request. Used as an attempt to ensure implicit lock releases on destruction.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Array of lock names (as values) for each persistent ID (as key) obtained during the current request.

docblock.description: The data storage.
docblock.long-description: Each persistent ID is a key, and the value is an array. Each such array has data keys as its keys, and an array as a value. Each such array has as its elements the value, the timeout and the time the data was set.

docblock.description: Creates a new shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Estabilishes a separate persistent storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID for the storage. The storage will be reused if it exists, or created if it doesn't exist. Data and locks are namespaced by this ID.

docblock.description: Releases any unreleased locks.
Checks if the adapter meets its requirements.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Pretends to obtain a lock.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Pretends to release a lock.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Checks if a specified key is in the storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to check.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if the key is in the storage, FALSE otherwise.

docblock.description: Adds a value to the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Adds a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, or fails if it does.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Because "true" adapters purge the cache at the next request, this setting is ignored.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Sets a value in the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Adds a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, overwrites it otherwise.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Because "true" adapters purge the cache at the next request, this setting is ignored.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Gets a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Gets the current value, or throws an exception if it's not stored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to get the value of.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The current value of the specified key.

docblock.description: Deletes a value from the shared memory storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to delete.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Increases a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Increases a value from the shared memory storage. Unlike a plain set($key, get($key)+$step) combination, this function also implicitly performs locking.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to increase.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value to increase the key by.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The new value.

docblock.description: Decreases a value from the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Decreases a value from the shared memory storage. Unlike a plain set($key, get($key)-$step) combination, this function also implicitly performs locking.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to decrease.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value to decrease the key by.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The new value.

docblock.description: Sets a new value if a key has a certain value.
docblock.long-description: Sets a new value if a key has a certain value. This function only works when $old and $new are longs.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Key of the value to compare and set.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value to compare the key against.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value to set the key to.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Clears the persistent storage.
docblock.long-description: Clears the persistent storage, i.e. removes all keys. Locks are left intact.

docblock.description: Retrieve an external iterator
docblock.long-description: Returns an external iterator.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A PCRE regular expression. Only matching keys will be iterated over. Setting this to NULL matches all keys of this instance.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Whether to return only the keys, or return both the keys and values.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array with all matching keys as array keys, and values as array values. If $keysOnly is TRUE, the array keys are numeric, and the array values are key names.

tag.name: var
tag.description: ID of the current storage.

docblock.description: List of persistent IDs.
docblock.long-description: A list of persistent IDs within the current request (as keys) with an int (as a value) specifying the number of instances in the current request. Used as an attempt to ensure implicit lock releases on destruction.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Array of lock names obtained during the current request.

docblock.description: Creates a new shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Estabilishes a separate persistent storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The ID for the storage. The storage will be reused if it exists, or created if it doesn't exist. Data and locks are namespaced by this ID.

docblock.description: Encodes a lock name
docblock.long-description: Encodes a lock name, so that it can be properly obtained. The scheme used is a subset of URL encoding, with only the "%" and "\" characters being escaped. The encoding itself is necessary, since lock names can't contain the "\" character.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The lock name to encode.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The encoded name.

docblock.description: Checks if the adapter meets its requirements.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Releases any locks obtained by this instance as soon as there are no more references to the object's persistent ID.
Obtains a named lock.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of the key to obtain. Note that $key may repeat for each distinct $persistentId.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Ignored with WinCache. Script will always block if the lock can't be immediatly obtained.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Releases a named lock.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of the key to release. Note that $key may repeat for each distinct $persistentId.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Checks if a specified key is in the storage.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to check.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if the key is in the storage, FALSE otherwise.

docblock.description: Adds a value to the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Sets a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, or fails if it does.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Seconds to store the value. If set to 0 indicates no time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

docblock.description: Sets a value in the shared memory storage.
docblock.long-description: Adds a value to the storage if it doesn't exist, overwrites it otherwise.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to associate the value with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Value for the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Seconds to store the value. If set to 0 indicates no time limit.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The current value of the specified key.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of key to delete.

tag.name: return

tag.name: return
